attributes.action: Open a concrete pump track next to the new ravine skatepark in filey
attributes.additional_details: I feel as though a pump track would be great for the community and teach people valuable skills on how to hold more speed while biking
attributes.background: Build a pump track at the new skatepark in filey like the one at new haven for the people who want to use it

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
